text: On Division Street, in front of Best Buy, and then on March 1 is swept away in big clear-out and moves tent to 13th and Harrison streets.
Takes street counselorâ€™s offer and moves to temporary Pier 80 homeless shelter near corner of Cesar Chavez and Third streets.
Leaves shortly before Pier 80 closes, pitches tent at Fourth and Harrison streets.
Living in tent on Utah Street near 16th Street.
